inspirational.text: Prayer is not asking. It is a longing of the soul.
inspirational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspirational.text: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
inspirational.author: Dwight L. Moody

inspirational.text: Sometimes the strength within you is not a big fiery flame for all to see, it's just a tiny spark that whispers softly 'you got this, keep going.'
inspirational.author: Anonymous

inspirational.text: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
inspirational.author: Desmond Tutu

inspirational.text: The best way to get through any challenge is to step back, take a deep breath, and pray.
inspirational.author: Anonymous

inspirational.text: Prayer is the bridge between panic and peace.
inspirational.author: Anonymous

inspirational.text: Where there is love, there is healing.
inspirational.author: Anonymous

inspirational.text: Faith does not make things easy, it makes them possible.
inspirational.author: Luke 1:37

inspirational.text: The more you pray, the more you find there is to pray about.
inspirational.author: Anonymous

inspirational.text: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
inspirational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspirational.text: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
inspirational.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspirational.text: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays.
inspirational.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspirational.text: To be a Christian without prayer is no more possible than to be alive without breathing.
inspirational.author: Martin Luther

inspirational.text: The prayer of a righteous person is powerful and effective.
inspirational.author: James 5:16

inspirational.text: Prayer is not asking for what you think you want, but asking to be changed in ways you can't imagine.
inspirational.author: Kathleen Norris

inspirational.text: Prayer is exhaling the spirit of man and inhaling the spirit of God.
inspirational.author: Edwin Keith

inspirational.text: The greatest tragedy of life is not unanswered prayer, but unoffered prayer.
inspirational.author: F.B. Meyer

inspirational.text: Prayer is not a spare wheel that you pull out when in trouble; it is a steering wheel that directs us in the right path throughout life.
inspirational.author: Anonymous

inspirational.text: Prayer is the place where burdens change shoulders.
inspirational.author: Anonymous

inspirational.text: Prayer is the key that unlocks all the storehouses of God's infinite grace and power.
inspirational.author: R.A. Torrey

healing.text: Healing is not linear. It's okay to take it one day at a time.
healing.author: Anonymous

healing.text: Your healing is a journey, not a destination.
healing.author: Anonymous

healing.text: Every prayer is a step toward healing.
healing.author: Anonymous

healing.text: Let your faith be bigger than your fears.
healing.author: Anonymous

healing.text: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
healing.author: Rumi

healing.text: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it.
healing.author: Tori Amos

healing.text: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
healing.author: Marianne Williamson

healing.text: Time heals all wounds, but faith makes the healing painless.
healing.author: Anonymous

healing.text: Healing is an art. It takes time. It takes practice. It takes love.
healing.author: Maza Dohta

healing.text: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
healing.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

healing.text: Healing may not be so much about getting better, as about letting go of everything that isn't you.
healing.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

healing.text: The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind.
healing.author: Caroline Myss

healing.text: Healing requires from us to stop struggling, but to enjoy life more and endure it less.
healing.author: Darina Stoyanova

healing.text: The natural healing force within each one of us is the greatest force in getting well.
healing.author: Hippocrates

healing.text: Healing yourself is connected with healing others.
healing.author: Yoko Ono

strength.text: You are stronger than you know, braver than you believe.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: Your strength is in your spirit, and your spirit is unbreakable.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: Strength grows in the moments when you think you can't go on but you keep going anyway.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: You have within you right now, everything you need to overcome any challenge.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow.
strength.author: Robert Tew

strength.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
strength.author: Mahatma Gandhi

strength.text: Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving; we get stronger and more resilient.
strength.author: Steve Maraboli

strength.text: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws.
strength.author: Barbara Kingsolver

strength.text: Strength is what we gain from the madness we survive.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
strength.author: Bob Marley

strength.text: The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: Strength shows not only in the ability to persist, but in the ability to start over.
strength.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

strength.text: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.
strength.author: Oprah Winfrey

strength.text: Strength isn't about bearing a cross of grief or shame. Strength comes from choosing your own path, and living with the consequences.
strength.author: Jennifer Armintrout

strength.text: Sometimes you don't realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.
strength.author: Susan Gale
